ygData.subject: New Patch message
ygData.msgSnippet: Two bits one maybe bad the other good: The possible bad: Root spells will now overwrite spells with both positive and negative movement components in a more
ygData.messageBody:
Two bits one maybe bad the other good:

The possible bad:
Root spells will now overwrite spells with both positive and negative
movement components in a more consistent pattern.

I wonder if this means that Selo's (accerando & chain) will no longer break
root. This would be very sad.

The good:
High level Bard song (LVL 40+) will be slightly easier to sing (less missed
notes).


Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server
